en-US.start.message: Hello there! Drop your media here to start transcription! (supports audio, video and image transcriptions).
en-US.help.header: Here are the currently available transcription types:
en-US.help.footer: Drop an audio, video or image to start your file transcription today! Have ideas and suggestions for this mini project? Head over to the Project Repository (https://github.com/tjtanjin/simple-transcriptions)!
en-US.transcription.invalid: The transcription has expired, please upload your file again.
en-US.gemini.no_api_key: Feature unavailable, no API key set.
en-US.interaction.not_allowed: You have an action pending, please wait!
en-US.interaction.file_not_supported: Unsupported file uploaded. Do /help to see supported file formats.
en-US.interaction.file_not_found: File not found, please upload again.
en-US.interaction.file_too_large: File size is too large, cannot exceed 20mb!
en-US.image.advise: You sent your image as a photo. If you run into transcription issues, try sending your image as a file instead.
en-US.misc.error: Action failed, please check your media type. If you believe this to be a bug, please open an issue at our Project Repository!
